content.original: Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 弹药舱包含射弹武器所需的弹药,每种武器类型至少需要一个弹舱.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

content.original: This ammunition is an attempt to make primitive Rifle weapons effective in the face of modern armor. Armor Piercing Fin Stabilized Discarding Sabot munitions have been used for centuries. Essentially a long heavy metal dart they punch through armor using kinetic energy alone; no explosive warhead is used. This means ammo explosions are less dangerous, but their damage decreases at long range. Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: This ammunition is an attempt to make primitive Rifle weapons effective in the face of modern armor. Armor Piercing Fin Stabilized Discarding Sabot munitions have been used for centuries. Essentially a long heavy metal dart they punch through armor using kinetic energy alone; no explosive warhead is used. This means ammo explosions are less dangerous, but their damage decreases at long range. Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 这种弹药试图使原始线膛武器在面对现代装甲时有效.穿甲尾翼稳定脱壳弹已经使用了几个世纪.本质上是一个长的重金属镖,他们只用动能穿透装甲;不使用爆炸弹头.这意味着弹药爆炸的危险性较小,但在远程情况下其伤害会降低.弹药舱包含射弹武器所需的弹药,每种武器类型至少需要一个弹舱.弹药舱包含射弹武器所需的弹药,每种武器类型至少需要一个弹舱.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

content.original: Made from ancient Blue Prints, this Rifle Munitions is encased in its propellant to save up space at cost of reliability. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: Made from ancient Blue Prints, this Rifle Munitions is encased in its propellant to save up space at cost of reliability. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 这种线膛炮弹药由古老的蓝图制成,装有推进剂,同时以降低可靠性为代价节省空间.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.
